Solutions for life sciences
SAP Concur helps pharma, biotech, and medical device companies gain visibility into how employees are spending, control costs, and stay compliant with regulations.
Contact us Read case study
Achieve superior business outcomes with innovative solutions

Globalization, changing regulations, and healthcare mergers and acquisitions are challenges life sciences organizations face. Track the ways your employees are spending, including spend on health care professionals, with SAP Concur solutions and:

Stay compliant with regulations
Automate to reimagine processes and scale
Implement easy-to-use mobile tools
Join a community of life sciences leaders

Read tip sheet Watch video

Keep up with ever-changing industry regulations

SAP Concur solutions help organizations comply with regulations (such as the Sunshine Act) with services that use machine learning and human expertise to audit improper expenses, catch exceptions, and track HCP spend. This allows organizations to meet industry demands like Open Payments.

Learn more Read blog

Experience growth without the pains

As the global business landscape changes, from the way organizations interact with stakeholders, their supply chain, and employees, companies need their travel and expense program to grow with them. Concur Travel and Expense offer efficient processes, better visibility into data, and lower risks.

Read ebook

Get a centralized view of data for greater visibility

In order to make fast, accurate business decisions in a dynamic industry, you need the most current data at your fingertips. With Intelligence, you can get a single, clear view into spend by combining travel, expense, invoice, and credit card data analytics into one system.

Learn more

Support your mobile workforce with easy-to-use tools

Mobile-first solutions like Concur Expense and Drive allow employees to take pictures of receipts, automatically capture mileage, and submit expense reports – all while on the go – which helps to increase adoption and talent retention.

Learn more Read ebook
